Description: Question 1 - General Presence: In the computer generated world I had a sense of "being there"
Question 2 - Spatial Presence: I had a sense of acting in the virtual space, rather than operating something from outside
Question 3 - Spatial Presence: I felt present in the virtual space
Question 4 - Involvement: How aware were you of the real world surrounding while navigating in the virtual world? (i.e. sounds, room temperature, other people, etc.)?
Question 5 - Realism: How much did your experience in the virtual environment seem consistent with your real world experience ?
